verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3198>don't<s%> rebuke me in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> neither <S%H3256>discipline<s%> me in your <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, for I am <S%H536>faint.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H6106>me,<s%> for my bones are <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is also in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H926>anguish.<s%> But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh â€”how long?
<S%H7725>Return,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H2502>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> me for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%>' sake.
For in <S%H4194>death<s%> there is no <S%H2143>memory<s%> of <S%H7585>you.<s%> In Sheol, who shall give you <S%H3034>thanks?<s%>
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H585>groaning.<s%> Every <S%H3915>night<s%> I <S%H7811>flood<s%> my <S%H4296>bed.<s%> I <S%H4529>drench<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with my <S%H1832>tears.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H6244>wastes<s%> away because of <S%H3708>grief.<s%> It grows <S%H6275>old<s%> because of all my <S%H6887>adversaries.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H6466>me,<s%> all you workers of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1065>weeping.<s%>
May all my <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H926>dismayed.<s%> <S%H3966><s%> They shall turn <S%H7725>back,<s%> they shall be <S%H954>disgraced<s%> <S%H7281>suddenly.<s%>
